predicate.note: Frames file for 'twin' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: match exactly, like an identical twin

example.name: passive, two arg1's
example.text: The Nagymaros dam was designed *trace* *trace* to be twinned *trace* with another dam, now nearly complete, 100 miles upstream in Czechoslovakia.
example.arg: another dam, now nearly complete, 100 miles upstream in Czechoslovakia

roleset.note: Following 'match' and similar verbs, 'twin' takes all matching objects as arg1.
